publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3808 Colin Fox: Abolition of NHS Prescription Charges (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Abolition of NHS Prescription Charges (Scotland) Bill. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3808 Colin Fox: Abolition of NHS Prescription Charges (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Abolition of NHS Prescription Charges (Scotland) Bill.
S2M-3808 Abolition of NHS Prescription Charges (Scotland) Bill (lodged on 12 January 2006) John Swinburne*

S2M-3808 Colin Fox: Abolition of NHS Prescription Charges (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Abolition of NHS Prescription Charges (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: John Swinburne
